content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
─────────────────────
No Research Facility (Lab) has been successfully placed despite multiple attempts.

### Iron Plate Furnace at Position(5.0, 5.0)
Consists of a single furnace unit used to smelt iron ore with coal into iron plates. These iron plates are essential as a core resource for subsequent production requirements.

### Copper Plate Furnace at Position(–27.0, –60.0)
Consists of a single furnace unit used to convert copper ore into copper plates. This processing unit supports the production chain necessary for generating copper‐based components.

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• API Usage for Entity Retrieval:
  – Avoid including unsupported keyword arguments (such as “radius”) when calling get_entities.
  – Do not pass unexpected positional arguments; follow the documented call signature.
  – Validate the return value from get_entities before iterating to prevent treating None as an iterable.

• Lab Placement and Crafting:
  – Ensure that a Lab item is present in the inventory before attempting to place it.
  – Confirm resource sufficiency for all sub‐ingredients (for example, iron-gear-wheels, electronic-circuits, and copper-cables) required for Lab production.
  – Validate the complete production chain and inventory status prior to initiating lab crafting to avoid cascading missing-ingredient errors.
